works.description:
This blog is infringing and should be  
removed or access to it disabled.

The copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web 

pages are not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
The  
information in the notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury,
 
I declare that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an  
exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Please disable access to blog such unauthorized materials of members of
the  
SIIA and cease display and distribution immediately, via all means, of
all proprietary materials of the SIIA. Your failure to respond to this  
matter as requested and/or any further unauthorized use of the SIIA's
Please note that nothing contained in this letter nor any act or omission 

to act by the members of the SIIA, its members, subsidiaries and
affiliates is intended or should be deemed to be a waiver or modification 

of any rights or remedies which the members of the SIIA, its parents,
subsidiaries and affiliates may have, and all such rights.

I look forward to your prompt response to this matter.

Sincerely,

Jason M. Allen
Manager, Internet Anti-Piracy
202.789.4477

SIIA Main Office
1090 Vermont Ave NW Sixth Floor
Washington DC 20005-4095
Main: 202.289.7442
Fax: 202.289.7097

Intellectual property right
